tool.name: SAGA.ta_hydrology.20
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySLOPE False isArrayAREA False isArrayTRANS False output_data_TWI $output_data_TWI name SAGA.ta_hydrology.20 SLOPE $SLOPE AREA $AREA TRANS $TRANS CONV $CONV METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TWI $OutputSection_TWI.outputType_TWI transmissionMode_TWI $OutputSection_TWI.transmissionMode_TWI

param.name: SLOPE
param.label: Slope
param.help: Slope The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: AREA
param.label: Catchment Area
param.help: Catchment Area The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TRANS
param.label: Transmissivity
param.help: Transmissivity The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: CONV
param.label: Area Conversion
param.option: no conversion (areas already given as specific catchment area)

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TWI
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TWI
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculation of the slope and specific catchment area (SCA) based Topographic Wetness Index (TWI).
